attributes.action: Block Huawei from supplying equipment and technology in our future 5G network.
attributes.additional_details: Why has our prime minister ignored advice by her own ministers and security advisors to allow Huawei access to our proposed 5G network? This is dispite other countries, and allies of ours, blocking them from there 5G networks on security grounds. Surely, if there is the slightest doubt about Huawei's guarantee on it's equipment, and software's integrity, we should air on the side of caution, and put our security first! There are other companies out there, equally capable of supplying equipment and technology for our 5G network.
attributes.background: Why has our prime minister ignored advice by her own ministers and security advisors to allow Huawei access to our proposed 5G network?
